analysis.description:
HDK_Crowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/43/0x96a61970a1cab6a85bc2faf544f873fb06237bdd.sol#273-276) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/43/0x96a61970a1cab6a85bc2faf544f873fb06237bdd.sol#274-276)

HDK_Crowdsale.withdrawTokens (/unique_chucks/43/0x96a61970a1cab6a85bc2faf544f873fb06237bdd.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,unsold) (/unique_chucks/43/0x96a61970a1cab6a85bc2faf544f873fb06237bdd.sol)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/43/0x96a61970a1cab6a85bc2faf544f873fb06237bdd.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/43/0x96a61970a1cab6a85bc2faf544f873fb06237bdd.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_beneficiary' of HDK_Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/43/0x96a61970a1cab6a85bc2faf544f873fb06237bdd.sol#237-238) is not in mixedCase
